example.eg: Lindsay is my cousin, so that makes her a relative. I send cards to my relatives at Christmas.
example.egtrans: 林溪是我的表姐，也就是我的亲戚。圣诞节的时候，我给自己的亲戚寄去了贺卡。

example.eg: Some people think it is acceptable to commit acts of relative evil in order to combat absolute evil.
example.egtrans: 有些人认为，以小恶对抗大恶是可以接受的。

example.eg: Maria and Petra discussed the relative advantages of travelling by train or by air.
example.egtrans: 玛利亚和佩特拉比较了乘火车和坐飞机出游的优缺点。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比较而言的, 相比的, 相对的

example.eg: The relative humidity of this climate can make it uncomfortable for those used to cooler, dryer areas.
example.egtrans: 对于那些习惯了凉爽、干燥地区的人们，这种气候的相对湿度会让人感到不适。

example.eg: His head seems too large relative to the rest of his body.
example.egtrans: 与他身体的其他部分相比，他的头部显得太大了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相对于…的, 与…相比的

example.eg: Your arguments make no sense relative to the subject we're discussing.
example.egtrans: 你的论点与我们正在讨论的主题毫无关系。

example.eg: Parents, siblings, and grandparents are all blood relatives.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 血亲, 有血缘关系的人

example.eg: Long relative clauses should ideally be enclosed by commas.
The weather was sunny with a relative humidity of 65%.
Relative pronouns are used to avoid repeating names of people.
